features: Energy-saving and long lifespan; BoostArea insists on producing eco-friendly LED floor lamps to make efforts to protect the planet; BoostArea standing lamps adopt advanced built-in led beads (Not replaceable); the floor lamp is 9 Watts (equals to 60W traditional bulbs) and has a long lifespan(>50,000 hrs), emitting 900 lumens lighting; consuming 90% less energy and being more effective, this floor lamp will save you electricity bills as well as money and time for maintenance

3000K natural light; BoostArea standing lamp emits 3000K warm white, highly simulated to natural daylight, which is perfect for working, reading, or other daily tasks; 3000K warm white lighting causes less eye stress and fatigue to better protect your eyes; besides, this tall lamp has a durable plastic lampshade with perfect light transmission, can also protect the led bulb from damage

Safety design from bottom to top; BoostArea designed the modern floor lamp with your family's safety in mind; the weighted base and sturdy metal pole make this standing lamp safe to have around children and pets because it will not easily tip over; since our standing lamps use led bulbs, it emits almost no heat and stays cools to touch; The lampshade is also using a resin plastic that avoids the broken risk of the fragile traditional glass shade; your safety is what we care about most

Stylish design and easy assembly; the stylish modern design of this LED floor lamp makes it more than a lamp, which can also be decorative floor lamps for living rooms and offices; BoostArea black modern floor lamps fit well with casual, urban, mid-century, or contemporary styles; without tools required, you just need to screw all the parts of the lamp pole together to finish the assembly; PS. The instruction is included in the package and the assembly video is attached to the product page

Compatible with smart devices; You can plug this floor lamp in the smart plug(not included), add it to your home appliances group, and easily controlled it by your phone; intelligent design help you enjoy easier life and home automation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy, sturdy, economical and bright?
reviews.reviewText: This lamp went together in less than 10 minutes. I don’t understand the comment about the on off switch being in the middle of the cord. Mine is on the top of the lamp near the bulb. The threading of the very sturdy pole pieces was excellent and the base is heavy enough to set the lamp on carpet without being tippy. Totally lights up, in a nice way, my spare bedroom that had no overhead light (2 nightstand lamps did very little to brighten the room). Super!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What I needed.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Nice level of light. Looks nice in the room. Good height also.i would buy this lamp again and will tell my friends about it. Thank you for an excellant, reasonably priced product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bang for the buck
reviews.reviewText: I was amazed at how quickly I got this torchier (lamp)! My last one (LED) was great, lasted many years and the base just crumbled out of the blue (it looks like the plastic base encased some relatively cheap plaster or cement). I threw that out, went to Amazon and saw this that was decently reviewed as seemed reasonably priced. When it arrived, I unpacked it from the box and had it up and running in about 20 minutes (I took my time deliberately to make sure I screwed on sections of the pole without being crooked), attached the plastic dome and switched it on. I do like the warm white light that the product says the color temperature ranges from 2700K - 3000K. Perfect for my living room. I am a bit skeptical about the bulb as it seems proprietary and make be difficult to get. The manufacturer could have built this lamp to use a standard LED bulb and allow the customer to decide that they want it in the WARM/BRIGHT or DAYLIGHT flavor or choose a higher wattage bulb for additional brightness if needed. What happens if the bulb burns out?If the area you are putting this lamp is on the larger side (say about 250 SF upwards) and you have it in the corner, it may be a little difficult to read a book (or the instructions that come with this lamp!).*Word of note: The turn switch is close to the dome so if you have this set back and there is a sofa, small table or chair between the lamp and a wall, if you are 'height challenged' you may have to tip toe to be able to reach it. It would have been better if the switch was in the middle of the pole (I understand the design of the slim pole may be hindering putting it mid pole). I also hope that the turn switch will last (it does seem a tad flimsy).Overall and thus far, it is quite a "good bang for the buck" lamp. Simple in design and addresses my simple needs of warm light in the living room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These lamps were Amazing; coming from someone who is not hands at all; I had no problems putting my lamps together. They are the perfect addition to any room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Addition to my Computer Room
reviews.reviewText: This lamp was super easy to assemble and the birghtness of the light is amazing. It gives off amazing light and illuminates the entire room. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This lamp looks great. Power switch is odd
reviews.reviewText: This is a good looking lamp. The power switch is half way down the cord so you have to keep the wire hanging out to turn it on and off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Filled a need well.
reviews.reviewText: Simple yet sturdy and works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a solid deal with a couple issues. I have purchased 5 similar units and know this type lamp does on last long and the head is not replaceable when it goes. That being said, they are all pretty similar but have different features. This one is the simplest with one light setting that can me made bright or dim using the mounted pressure pad. The issue with the one I received is the cable that attaches to the lamp head was too long and difficult to get back into the tube. I almost sent it back. I managed to get it to fit and it is working fine. The other downside: If you plug the lamp into an outlet with a wall switch, it will not turn the lamp on. It can only be turned on from the switch mounted to the lamp. This is inconvenient but given the sale price, I can deal with it
